dmca.title: [ABUSE] copyright infringement, harrassment, stalking-like behavior
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 31, 2005 6:00 PM
To: p.holtby@worldnet.att.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement, harrassment, stalking-like
behavior]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] copyright infringement, harrassment, stalking-like
behavior
Date:         Sun, 29 May 2005 14:37:34 -0700
From:         Patricia Holtby <p.holtby@worldnet.att.net>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Abuse Department at ThePlanet,

I am informing you that one of your customers, agonyproductions.com, is
allowing the cutting and pasting of whole chunks of my website content to
their website.

I wish to have my content removed from their website.

I have no desire to infringe on anyone's free speech rights and they may
post whatever opinions about me or my website content that they wish, but
the cutting and pasting of actual copyrighted content is not allowed.

The url where my content has been displayed on this website is
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=21097  It begins with
the first post in this thread column.

The url where my original content exists on my own website is
http://p083.ezboard.com/ftheofficialunofficialpglmessageboardfrm261.showMess
age?topicID=10.topic

Just because it is Ezboard, you will not be able to view the thread until
you are registered (FREE) and signed in to an Ezboard account.

I do have screen captures of the thread at agonyproductions.com where my
content has been cut and pasted. I considered pasting the screen capture
images into the body of this email and I can still do that at your request,
but I was concerned it would make this email too big. Please let me know if
you would like to see them.

Here is yet another example of my website content being cut and pasted to
the agonyproductions.com website:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20971&highlight
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20971&highlight>=

Here is where it appears in its original form on my own website:
http://p083.ezboard.com/ftheofficialunofficialpglmessageboardfrm189.showMess
age?topicID=2686.topic

Normally, you would only be concerned with, "Did this act of copying take
place or not?" and not be so much concerned with the person's motives. You
only want to know if they did a specific act or not.

But, in this case, this one incident is one out of many incidents of
harrassment and stalking-like behavior by a small group of individuals who
had to be banned from my website community for their abusive conduct toward
other members of the community.

They track me down throughout cyberspace and create as much havoc and
anguish as they possibly can. This includes impersonating me as they have
done on the agonyproductions.com messageboard and this is done with the
consent and blessing of agonyproduction.com's owners and operators and that
is the reason why I cannot directly appeal to them for the removal of my
website content from their website. It is a long-standing pattern that they
have allowed.

Other examples of the harrassment and stalking-like behavior that
agonyproductions.com allows against me on their website can be found at
these urls:

http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=21058&highlight
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=21058&highlight>=
This is a poll started by one of my stalkers who has taken to impersonating
me by duplicating my internet user name by which I am known in the online
writing community that stretches across numerous writer websites.

Another example of harrassment/stalking by the agonyproductions.com member
who copies my user name can be found here:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19978&start=0
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19978&start=0>

The owners and operators of this website allow direct "hotlinking" to images
on other websites. Here, in this url, the stalker who copied my user name
does exactly that:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=21018&highlight
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=21018&highlight>=

Another example where agonyproductions.com allows direct "hotlinking" of
images from other websites can be found here:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20561&postdays=0&post
order=asc&start=125

<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20561&postdays=0&pos
torder=asc&start=125>

In this thread, the stalker who copied my user name harasses another member
of the community and the result is that this person now becomes one of MY
enemies because they believe that is me doing that to them.
That is the sole purpose for this harassing and stalking behavior - to
ostracize me and cut me off from normal discourse with other writers.
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20988&start=0
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20988&start=0>

In this thread, agonyproductions.com truly flirts with legal complications
by allowing the real-life name of a real person to be used. John Gulager is
a film director. Even though I do understand that I personally have no
"legal standing" to defend his good name and his privacy, I can easily
inform Mr. Gulager's associates that this has been done and let them know if
they wish to take legal action, I can provide them with proof that this use
of his name has happened and that you, ThePlanet, will have been aware of it
as of the date you received this email. The url:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20969&start=0
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20969&start=0>

I have been the target of anti-semitism by some among the
agonyproduction.com community as evidenced by remarks like this: "no, I was
just saying that it amazes me that anybody (other than that puckel
person) would even go to *a jewhoo site*, let alone be banned LOL" which can
be found here:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20823&start=0
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20823&start=0>
Are you proud to have ThePlanet associated with anti-semitism?

Here, the stalker who has copied my user name posts racist crap that they
wish everyone to believe is from me. This is defamation because it seeks to
maliciously and deliberately ostracize me from my fellow
writers:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19555&postdays=0&post
order=asc&start=75

<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19555&postdays=0&pos
torder=asc&start=75>

In the following url, one of agonyproduction.com's members copies and pastes
whole chunks of yet another website (I will be informing this website that
they may wish to protect their own copyrights):
~ http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20465&start=0
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20465&start=0>
The website that has been copied and pasted in whole chunks to
agonyproductions.com is located here:  http://www.fugly.com

In the agonyproduction.com thread titled, "Uhuru has lost her rabbit assed
mind," (which is itself a defamatory statement and which is allowed by the
owners and operators of agonyproductions.com), I am exposed to further
harrassment by false and defamatory statements and various invasions of my
privacy and real life. This incessant stalking has continued for several
years. Now agonyproductions.com has brought it all to ThePlanet's doorstep,
so to speak. And I expect that you will want to disassociate your company
from this sort of thing. The url:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20561&start=0
<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=20561&start=0>

In that thread referenced in the above paragraph, they also link to a
website that uses as part of its name a call to do violence against my
person. So, you can see why I am concerned.

Also, in that thread, more content from my website has been copied and
pasted without my consent to the agonyproduction.com website with the
consent and encouragement of the owners and operators of the
agonyproduction.com website*_. I must insist that my website content be
removed from the agonyproduction.com website_*. Do you find it at all
disturbing that these people are so blatant in their theft of content from
other websites and their pattern of vicious stalking and harrassment?

Here, in this thread, *_my real-life name is published without my consent
and my privacy is invaded and my personal safety threatened_* by the
publication of my real name. I must demand its immediate removal. I will
check this website again within 48 hours and if my real name is not removed,
I will seek legal action against agonyproductions.com *_and your company_*
for having knowledge of it and doing nothing to safeguard my privacy and my
security. Keep in mind that I have not posted here on this website for at
least three years and my personal security is still threatened by the
stalkers at agonyproductions.com. Here is the url:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19555&postdays=0&post
order=asc&start=75

<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19555&postdays=0&pos
torder=asc&start=75>
*YOU
MAY HAVE UNTIL THE END OF THE BUSINESS DAY TUESDAY, MAY 31, 2005 TO REMOVE
MY REAL LIFE NAME FROM THIS WEBSITE*. After that, I will seek all legal
remedies available to me and I will hold your company liable.
Because now you know.

Yet another example of where my real life name has been published on
agonyproduction.com:
http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19596&highlight=holtb
y

<http://www.agonyproductions.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=19596&highlight=holt
by>
*REMOVE
IT AT ONCE!* That the webmaster or moderator known as Devereaux73 always
deletes EVERYONE ELSE'S  real names when they are published and has NOT done
so in my case shows 1) that he has a consciousness that it is wrong; and 2)
he wishes to single me out for this wrong behavior.


There are many more examples of the violations of what I am certain must be
included in your company's Terms of Service at the agonyproductions.com
website but this email would go on for absolutely forever if I tried to list
every one. Hopefully, this small sampling will open your eyes to what use
agonyproduction.com is making of your webhost service and the legal
liability that your company may now face as a result if you do not take
steps to immediately rectify this situation.

I am prepared to go "upstream" and inform myacer.com as well as seeking
legal assistance to protect my personal safety and my copyrighted website
content. If you force me to take legal action (which I hope will not become
necessary), there will be no turning back from it once it gets underway.

I think there is a very simple solution here and I think you know what that
is.

Sincerely,
Patricia Holtby
Internet Names: "Queen Uhuru" and "uhuru1701" (all such names appearing on
the agonyproduction.com website are NOT me)

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
